definition: owner/master/host/individual or party concerned/God/Lord/main/to indicate or signify/trump card (in card games)
topic/problem for discussion/exam question/subject/to inscribe/to mention/CL:個|个[ge4],道[dao4]
land used for growing plants/site used for public recreation/abbr. for a place ending in 園|园, such as a botanical garden 植物園|植物园, kindergarten 幼兒園|幼儿园 etc

sentences.english: Disney world is a wonderful theme park.
sentences.chinese: 迪斯尼世界是个极好的主题乐园。

sentences.english: THINK of theme parks and you think of roller coasters .
sentences.chinese: 一提到主题乐园，你马上想到的云霄飞车。

sentences.english: The theme park is funded by private enterprise.
sentences.chinese: 这个主题乐园是由私企投资建设的。

sentences.english: Through the conclusions and suggestion, the results could serve as a reference for Leofoo Village Theme Park.
sentences.chinese: 根据研究结果本研究对六福村主题乐园提出建议。

sentences.english: There are also two water theme parks in DisneyWorld, good enough for you to enjoy the water.
sentences.chinese: 在里面也有两个水上主题乐园，足以让你玩过瘾了。

definition: Disneyland/also written 迪士尼樂園|迪士尼乐园[Di2 shi4 ni2 Le4 yuan2]
Disney (company name, surname)/also written 迪士尼[Di2 shi4 ni2]
outlets (loanword)/retail outlet (e.g. specializing in seconds of famous brands)/factory outlet retail store
